description: a half figure on a mound base; the arms free of the body and the hands to the navel; inlaid cowrie shell eyes and a prominent pursed mouth set low in a prognathous chin; a tall cranial receptacle; the torso wrapped in fibre cloth; a reddish brown with a glossy patina on the face
medium: wood, cowrie shells, vegetable fibre cloth, string, animal pelt
title: Figure on Mound Base with Shell Eyes
